Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Modifies the requirements for financial disclosures for certain state and legislative officials, officers and employees
Summary: Modifies the requirements for financial disclosures for certain state and legislative officials, officers and employees.
LawCode: Amd ยง73-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to required financial disclosures for certain state and legislative officials, officers and employees
